mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM kpi_user ORDER BY reg_date DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

select WM_CONCAT(ROW_LIST) as top_list from( select B.GRP_NM AS ROW_LIST,a.KPI_SEQ,a.END_DATE,a.KPI_AND,a.KPI_STEP from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and( (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM1' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM1 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM2' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM2 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM3' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM3 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM4' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM4 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM5' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM5 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM6' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM6 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM7' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM7 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM9' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM9 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM13' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM13 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM8' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM8 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM10' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM10 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM11' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM11 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM12' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM12 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM15' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM15 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) ) AND KPI_AND ='N' AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} )cnt

select WM_CONCAT(ROW_LIST) as low_list from( select B.GRP_NM AS ROW_LIST,a.KPI_SEQ,a.END_DATE,a.KPI_AND,a.KPI_STEP from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and( (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM1' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM1 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD ) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM2' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM2 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD ) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM3' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM3 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD ) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM4' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM4 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM5' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM5 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM6' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM6 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM7' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM7 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM9' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM9 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM13' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM13 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM8' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM8 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM10' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM10 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM11' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM11 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM12' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM12 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM15' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM15 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) ) AND KPI_AND ='N' AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} )cnt

select KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,EVENT_NAME ,EVENT_ADDR ,EVENT_HP ,EVENT_USE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER where KPI_SEQ = (select max(KPI_SEQ) from SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER) AND KPI_STEP ='0' AND END_DATE IS NULL order by LOAD_DATE desc

select KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM8_PAY ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM10_PAY ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM11_PAY ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM12_PAY ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_TOTAL ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,KPI_AND ,EVENT_NAME ,EVENT_ADDR ,EVENT_HP ,EVENT_USE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1 = 1 AND kpi_seq = #{kpi_seq} AND END_DATE IS NULL order by KPI_SEQ desc

select cnt.KPI_SEQ ,cnt.COMPANY ,cnt.LICENSEE ,cnt.CEO_NAME ,cnt.BUSINESS_TYPE ,cnt.BS_TYPE ,cnt.CITY_ZONE ,cnt.KPI_FORM1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM4 ,cnt.KPI_FORM5 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6 ,cnt.KPI_FORM7 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM9 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM11 ,cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM12 ,cnt.KPI_FORM12_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM13 ,cnt.KPI_FORM14 ,cnt.KPI_FORM15 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_4 ,cnt.KPI_STEP ,cnt.LOAD_DATE ,cnt.END_DATE ,KPI_WORK_N ,KPI_PAY_N ,KPI_HERE_N ,KPI_SALES_N ,KPI_BS_N ,(KPI_FORM1+KPI_FORM2+KPI_FORM3+KPI_FORM4+KPI_FORM5+KPI_FORM6+KPI_FORM7+KPI_PAY_N+KPI_FORM9+KPI_HERE_N+KPI_SALES_N+KPI_BS_N+KPI_WORK_N)AS TOTAL_POINT FROM( SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM8_PAY ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM10_PAY ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM11_PAY ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM12_PAY ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM8_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM8_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_PAY' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_PAY_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - MOD(a.KPI_FORM11_PAY , a.KPI_FORM10_PAY)), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - MOD(a.KPI_FORM11_PAY , a.KPI_FORM10_PAY))) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_WORK_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_WORK_N ,( select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM10_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM10_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_HIRE' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_HERE_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM11_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM11_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_SALES_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM12_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM12_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_BS_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_BS_N from social_info_master where 1=1 order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt where 1=1 AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc

select cnt.KPI_SEQ ,cnt.COMPANY ,cnt.LICENSEE ,cnt.CEO_NAME ,cnt.BUSINESS_TYPE ,cnt.BS_TYPE ,cnt.CITY_ZONE ,cnt.KPI_FORM1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM4 ,cnt.KPI_FORM5 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6 ,cnt.KPI_FORM7 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM9 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM11 ,cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM12 ,cnt.KPI_FORM12_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM13 ,cnt.KPI_FORM14 ,cnt.KPI_FORM15 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_4 ,cnt.KPI_STEP ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LOAD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD.hh24mi'),'YYYY-MM-DD')as LOAD_DATE ,cnt.END_DATE ,KPI_WORK_N ,KPI_PAY_N ,KPI_HERE_N ,KPI_SALES_N ,KPI_BS_N ,(KPI_FORM1+KPI_FORM2+KPI_FORM3+KPI_FORM4+KPI_FORM5+KPI_FORM6+KPI_FORM7+KPI_PAY_N+KPI_FORM9+KPI_HERE_N+KPI_SALES_N+KPI_BS_N+KPI_WORK_N+KPI_FORM13)AS TOTAL_POINT FROM( SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM8_PAY ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM10_PAY ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM11_PAY ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM12_PAY ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM8_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM8_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_PAY' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_PAY_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - MOD(a.KPI_FORM11_PAY , a.KPI_FORM10_PAY)), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - MOD(a.KPI_FORM11_PAY , a.KPI_FORM10_PAY))) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_WORK_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_WORK_N ,( select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM10_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM10_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_HIRE' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_HERE_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM11_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM11_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_SALES_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from( select SERVICE_NUM, abs ( b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM12_PAY), ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ABS(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM12_PAY)) rn from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_BS_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} ) where rn =1) as KPI_BS_N from social_info_master where 1=1 order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt where 1=1 AND KPI_SEQ =#{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc
mapper.update: UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_FORM8_PAY = REPLACE(#{kpi_form8_pay}, ',', '' ) ,KPI_FORM9 = #{kpi_form9} ,KPI_STEP = '7' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} AND END_DATE IS NULL

UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_FORM10_PAY = REPLACE( #{kpi_form10_pay}, ',', '' ) , KPI_FORM11_PAY = REPLACE( #{kpi_form11_pay}, ',', '' ) , KPI_FORM12_PAY = REPLACE( #{kpi_form12_pay}, ',', '' ) ,KPI_STEP = '8' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} AND END_DATE IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER (kpi_seq,LOAD_DATE,KPI_STEP) VALUES( SEQ_SOCIAL_KPI.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD.hh24mi'), '0' )
mapper.select: select RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result a, social_info_master b where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='4' AND TOTAL_TYPE = b.BUSINESS_TYPE AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='3' AND TOTAL_TYPE= '1' )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT trunc(KPI_FORM1+KPI_FORM2+KPI_FORM3+KPI_FORM4+KPI_FORM5+KPI_FORM6+KPI_FORM7+KPI_FORM8+KPI_FORM9,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt

select RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result a, social_info_master b where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='6' AND TOTAL_TYPE = b.BUSINESS_TYPE AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='5' AND TOTAL_TYPE= '1' )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT trunc(KPI_FORM10+KPI_FORM11+KPI_FORM12+KPI_FORM15,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt

select RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result a, social_info_master b where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='8' AND TOTAL_TYPE = b.BUSINESS_TYPE AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='7' AND TOTAL_TYPE= '1' )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT trunc(KPI_FORM13,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt

select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM1 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM2 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT trunc(KPI_FORM3 * 10,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM4 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM5 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT trunc(KPI_FORM6 * 10,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM7 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM8 * 10) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM9 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT ( KPI_FORM10 * 10) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM11 * 10) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT ( KPI_FORM12 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM15 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT trunc(KPI_FORM13 * 10,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{kpi_seq} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt

SELECT rnum, KPI_STEP, COMPANY, kpi_seq, BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, LOAD_DATE, KPI_TOTAL_NUM, EVENT_USE, EVENT_USE_YN, END_DT, EVENT_ADDR, KPI_STEP_NM FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, KPI_STEP, COMPANY, kpi_seq, (SELECT GRP_NM FROM SERVICEINFO_CODE_STANDARD WHERE GRP_CD = 'SERVICE_CODE' AND CD = BUSINESS_TYPE) AS BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, LOAD_DATE, DECODE(KPI_TOTAL,null,'0',KPI_TOTAL)KPI_TOTAL_NUM, EVENT_USE, DECODE(EVENT_USE,null, 'N',EVENT_USE)EVENT_USE_YN, DECODE(END_DATE,null, '',END_DATE)END_DT, EVENT_ADDR, ( CASE KPI_STEP WHEN '1' THEN '1.회사 기본정보' WHEN '2' THEN '2.사회적 미션의 관리' WHEN '3' THEN '3.주사업활동의 사회적 가치' WHEN '4' THEN '4.사회적경제 생태계 구축노력' WHEN '5' THEN '5.이윤의 사회목적 재투자' WHEN '6' THEN '6.운영의 민주성' WHEN '7' THEN '7.근로자 지향성' WHEN '8' THEN '8.기업활동에서의 혁신성' WHEN '9' THEN '완료' ELSE '0' END)KPI_STEP_NM FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER where 1=1 and KPI_STEP between '1' and '9' ORDER BY LOAD_DATE DESC)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

SELECT rnum, KPI_STEP, COMPANY, kpi_seq, BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, LOAD_DATE, KPI_TOTAL_NUM, EVENT_USE, EVENT_USE_YN, END_DT, EVENT_ADDR, KPI_STEP_NM FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, KPI_STEP, COMPANY, kpi_seq, (SELECT GRP_NM FROM SERVICEINFO_CODE_STANDARD WHERE GRP_CD = 'SERVICE_CODE' AND CD = BUSINESS_TYPE) AS BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, LOAD_DATE, DECODE(KPI_TOTAL,null,'0',KPI_TOTAL)KPI_TOTAL_NUM, EVENT_USE, DECODE(EVENT_USE,null, 'N',EVENT_USE)EVENT_USE_YN, DECODE(END_DATE,null, '',END_DATE)END_DT, EVENT_ADDR, ( CASE KPI_STEP WHEN '1' THEN '1.회사 기본정보' WHEN '2' THEN '2.사회적 미션의 관리' WHEN '3' THEN '3.주사업활동의 사회적 가치' WHEN '4' THEN '4.사회적경제 생태계 구축노력' WHEN '5' THEN '5.이윤의 사회목적 재투자' WHEN '6' THEN '6.운영의 민주성' WHEN '7' THEN '7.근로자 지향성' WHEN '8' THEN '8.기업활동에서의 혁신성' WHEN '9' THEN '완료' ELSE '0' END)KPI_STEP_NM FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER where 1=1
and KPI_STEP = 9
and KPI_STEP between '1' and '8'
and KPI_STEP between '1' and '9'
ORDER BY LOAD_DATE DESC )
WHERE rnum >= #{start, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rnum <= #{end, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT rnum, KPI_STEP, COMPANY, kpi_seq, BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, LOAD_DATE, KPI_TOTAL_NUM, EVENT_USE, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_HP, EVENT_USE_YN, END_DT, EVENT_ADDR, KPI_STEP_NM FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, KPI_STEP, COMPANY, kpi_seq, (SELECT GRP_NM FROM SERVICEINFO_CODE_STANDARD WHERE GRP_CD = 'SERVICE_CODE' AND CD = BUSINESS_TYPE) AS BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, LOAD_DATE, DECODE(KPI_TOTAL,null,'0',KPI_TOTAL)KPI_TOTAL_NUM, EVENT_USE, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_HP, DECODE(EVENT_USE,null, 'N',EVENT_USE)EVENT_USE_YN, DECODE(END_DATE,null, '',END_DATE)END_DT, EVENT_ADDR, ( CASE KPI_STEP WHEN '1' THEN '1.회사 기본정보' WHEN '2' THEN '2.사회적 미션의 관리' WHEN '3' THEN '3.주사업활동의 사회적 가치' WHEN '4' THEN '4.사회적경제 생태계 구축노력' WHEN '5' THEN '5.이윤의 사회목적 재투자' WHEN '6' THEN '6.운영의 민주성' WHEN '7' THEN '7.근로자 지향성' WHEN '8' THEN '8.기업활동에서의 혁신성' WHEN '9' THEN '완료' ELSE '0' END)KPI_STEP_NM FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP = '9' AND EVENT_USE ='Y' ORDER BY LOAD_DATE DESC )
WHERE rnum >= #{start, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rnum <= #{end, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
